massim.competition2013.monitor.render

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • massim.competition2013.monitor.render.Renderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionTargetRenderer, PolygonAgentsRenderer

    public abstract class Renderer
extends Object
    Renders a game graph. Has a static factory method for instantiating different renderer. Hides the renderers' implementation from the client.
    Author:
    tristanbehrens

      • getNextMode

        public static Renderer.VisMode getNextMode(Renderer.VisMode visMode)
        Returns the next visualization mode from the one given as a parameter. It cycles to first one when the parameter is the last one. Useful for switching between modes.
        Parameters:
        visMode - the current visualization mode
        Returns:
        the next visualization mode
